email_text.subject: New notification from {$siteTitle}
email_text.description: The email is sent to registered users that have selected to have this type of notification emailed to them.

email_text.subject: New notification from {$siteTitle}
email_text.description: This email is sent to unregistered users on the notification mailing list.

email_text.subject: Welcome to the the {$siteTitle} mailing list!
email_text.description: This email is sent to an unregistered user who just registered with the notification mailing list.

email_text.subject: Password Reset Confirmation
email_text.description: This email is sent to a registered user when they indicate that they have forgotten their password or are unable to login. It provides a URL they can follow to reset their password.

email_text.subject: Password Reset
email_text.description: This email is sent to a registered user when they have successfully reset their password following the process described in the PASSWORD_RESET_CONFIRM email.

email_text.subject: Press Registration
email_text.description: This email is sent to a newly registered user to welcome them to the system and provide them with a record of their username and password.

email_text.subject: Validate Your Account
email_text.description: This email is sent to a newly registered user to welcome them to the system and provide them with a record of their username and password.

email_text.subject: Registration as Reviewer with {$contextName}
email_text.description: This email is sent to a newly registered reviewer to welcome them to the system and provide them with a record of their username and password.

email_text.subject: New Book Published
email_text.description: This email is sent to registered readers via the "Notify Users" link in the Editor's User Home. It notifies readers of a new book and invites them to visit the press at a supplied URL.

email_text.subject: Submission Acknowledgement
email_text.description: This email, when enabled, is automatically sent to an author when he or she completes the process of submitting a manuscript to the press. It provides information about tracking the submission through the process and thanks the author for the submission.

email_text.subject: Submission Acknowledgement
email_text.body:
Hello,
{$submitterName} has submitted the manuscript, "{$submissionTitle}" to {$contextName}.
If you have any questions, please contact me. Thank you for considering this press as a venue for your work.
{$editorialContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email, when enabled, is automatically sent to the other authors who are not users within OMP specified during the submission process.

email_text.subject: Unsuitable Submission
Submission Comment
email_text.description: This email notifies the various people involved in a submission's editing process that a new comment has been posted.

email_text.subject: Decision on "{$submissionTitle}"
email_text.description: This email notifies the reviewers of a submission that the review process has been completed. It includes information about the monograph and the decision reached, and thanks the reviewers for their contributions.

email_text.subject: Editorial Assignment
email_text.description: This email notifies a Series Editor that the Editor has assigned them the task of overseeing a submission through the editing process. It provides information about the submission and how to access the press site.

email_text.subject: Manuscript Review Request
email_text.description: This email from the Series Editor to a Reviewer requests that the reviewer accept or decline the task of reviewing a submission. It provides information about the submission such as the title and abstract, a review due date, and how to access the submission itself. This message is used when the Standard Review Process is selected in Press Setup, Step 2. (Otherwise see REVIEW_REQUEST_ATTACHED.)

email_text.subject: Manuscript Review Request
email_text.description: This email from the Series Editor to a Reviewer requests that the reviewer accept or decline the task of reviewing a submission. It provides information about the submission such as the title and abstract, a review due date, and how to access the submission itself. This message is used when the Standard Review Process is selected in Press Setup, Step 2, and one-click reviewer access is enabled.

email_text.subject: Manuscript Review Request
email_text.body:
{$reviewerName}:
I believe that you would serve as an excellent reviewer of the manuscript, "{$submissionTitle}," and I am asking that you consider undertaking this important task for us. The Review Guidelines for this press are appended below, and the submission is attached to this email. Your review of the submission, along with your recommendation, should be emailed to me by {$reviewDueDate}.
Please indicate in a return email by {$weekLaterDate} whether you are able and willing to do the review.
Thank you for considering this request.
{$editorialContactSignature}
Review Guidelines
{$reviewGuidelines}
email_text.description: This email is sent by the Series Editor to a Reviewer to request that they accept or decline the task of reviewing a submission. It includes the submission as an attachment. This message is used when the Email-Attachment Review Process is selected in Press Setup, Step 2. (Otherwise see REVIEW_REQUEST.)

email_text.subject: Request for Review Cancelled
email_text.body:
{$reviewerName}:
We have decided at this point to cancel our request for you to review the submission, "{$submissionTitle}," for {$contextName}. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause you and hope that we will be able to call on you to assist with this review process in the future.
If you have any questions, please contact me.
{$editorialContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email is sent by the Series Editor to a Reviewer who has a submission review in progress to notify them that the review has been cancelled.

email_text.subject: Able to Review
email_text.description: This email is sent by a Reviewer to the Series Editor in response to a review request to notify the Series Editor that the review request has been accepted and will be completed by the specified date.

email_text.subject: Unable to Review
email_text.description: This email is sent by a Reviewer to the Series Editor in response to a review request to notify the Series Editor that the review request has been declined.

email_text.subject: Manuscript Review Completed
email_text.description: This email is sent by a Reviewer to the Series Editor to notify them that a review has been completed and the comments and recommendations have been recorded on the press web site.

email_text.subject: Manuscript Review Acknowledgement
email_text.description: This email is sent by a Series Editor to confirm receipt of a completed review and thank the reviewer for their contributions.

email_text.subject: Submission Review Reminder
email_text.description: This email is sent by a Series Editor to remind a reviewer that their review is due.

email_text.subject: Submission Review Reminder
email_text.description: This email is sent by a Series Editor to remind a reviewer that their review is due.

email_text.description: This email is automatically sent when a reviewer's due date elapses (see Review Options under Press Setup, Step 2) and one-click reviewer access is disabled. Scheduled tasks must be enabled and configured (see the site configuration file).

email_text.subject: Automated Submission Review Reminder
email_text.description: This email is automatically sent when a reviewer's due date elapses (see Review Options under Press Setup, Step 2) and one-click reviewer access is enabled. Scheduled tasks must be enabled and configured (see the site configuration file).

email_text.subject: Copyediting Request
email_text.description: This email is sent by a Series Editor to a submission's Copyeditor to request that they begin the copyediting process. It provides information about the submission and how to access it.

email_text.subject: Copyediting Completed
email_text.body:
{$editorialContactName}:
We have now copyedited your submission "{$submissionTitle}" for {$contextName}. To review the proposed changes and respond to Author Queries, please follow these steps:
1. Log into the press using URL below with your username and password (use Forgot link if needed). 2. Click on the file at 1. Initial Copyedit File to download and open copyedited version. 3. Review the copyediting, making changes using Track Changes in Word, and answer queries. 4. Save file to desktop and upload it in 2. Author Copyedit. 5. Click the email icon under COMPLETE and send email to the editor.
This is the last opportunity that you have to make substantial changes. You will be asked at a later stage to proofread the galleys, but at that point only minor typographical and layout errors can be corrected.
Manuscript URL: {$submissionEditingUrl} Username: {$authorUsername}
If you are unable to undertake this work at this time or have any questions, please contact me. Thank you for your contribution to this press.
{$copyeditorName}

email_text.subject: Copyediting Acknowledgement
email_text.description: This email is sent by the Series Editor to a submission's Copyeditor to acknowledge that the Copyeditor has successfully completed the copyediting process and thank them for their contribution.

email_text.subject: Copyediting Review Request
email_text.body:
{$authorName}:
Your submission "{$submissionTitle}" for {$contextName} has been through the first step of copyediting, and is available for you to review by following these steps.
1. Click on the Submission URL below. 2. Log into the press and click on the File that appears in Step 1. 3. Open the downloaded submission. 4. Review the text, including copyediting proposals and Author Queries. 5. Make any copyediting changes that would further improve the text. 6. When completed, upload the file in Step 2. 7. Click on METADATA to check indexing information for completeness and accuracy. 8. Send the COMPLETE email to the editor and copyeditor.
Submission URL: {$submissionCopyeditingUrl} Username: {$authorUsername}
This is the last opportunity to make substantial copyediting changes to the submission. The proofreading stage, that follows the preparation of the galleys, is restricted to correcting typographical and layout errors.
If you are unable to undertake this work at this time or have any questions, please contact me. Thank you for your contribution to this press.
{$editorialContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email is sent by the Series Editor to a submission's Author to request that they proofread the work of the copyeditor. It provides access information for the manuscript and warns that this is the last opportunity the author has to make substantial changes.

email_text.subject: Copyediting Review Completed
email_text.description: This email is sent by the Author to the Series Editor to notify them that the Author's copyediting process has been completed.

email_text.subject: Copyediting Review Acknowledgement
email_text.description: This email is sent by the Series Editor to a submission's Author to confirm completion of the Author's copyediting process and thank them for their contribution.

email_text.subject: Copyediting Final Review
email_text.description: This email from the Series Editor to the Copyeditor requests that they perform a final round of copyediting on a submission before it enters the layout process.

email_text.subject: Copyediting Final Review Completed
email_text.description: This email from the Copyeditor to the Series Editor notifies them that the final round of copyediting has been completed and that the layout process may now begin.

email_text.subject: Copyediting Final Review Acknowledgement
email_text.description: This email from the Series Editor to the Copyeditor acknowledges completion of the final round of copyediting and thanks them for their contribution.

email_text.subject: Request Galleys
email_text.description: This email from the Series Editor to the Layout Editor notifies them that they have been assigned the task of performing layout editing on a submission. It provides information about the submission and how to access it.

email_text.subject: Layout Galleys Complete
email_text.body:
{$editorialContactName}:
Galleys have now been prepared for the manuscript, "{$submissionTitle}," for {$contextName} and are ready for proofreading.
If you have any questions, please contact me.
{$signatureFullName}
email_text.description: This email from the Layout Editor to the Series Editor notifies them that the layout process has been completed.

email_text.subject: Layout Acknowledgement
email_text.description: This email from the Series Editor to the Layout Editor acknowledges completion of the layout editing process and thanks the layout editor for their contribution.

email_text.subject: Request Index
email_text.description: This email from the Series Editor to the Indexer notifies them that they have been assigned the task of creating indexes for a submission. It provides information about the submission and how to access it.

email_text.subject: Index Galleys Complete
email_text.body:
{$editorialContactName}:
Indexes have now been prepared for the manuscript, "{$submissionTitle}," for {$contextName} and are ready for proofreading.
If you have any questions, please contact me.
{$signatureFullName}
email_text.description: This email from the Indexer to the Series Editor notifies them that the index creation process has been completed.

email_text.subject: Proofreading Request (Author)
email_text.description: This email from the Series Editor to the Author notifies them that a monograph's galleys are ready for proofreading. It provides information about the monograph and how to access it.

email_text.subject: Proofreading Completed (Author)
email_text.description: This email from the Author to the Proofreader and Editor notifies them that the Author's round of proofreading is complete and that details can be found in the monograph comments.

email_text.subject: Proofreading Acknowledgement (Author)
email_text.body:
{$authorName}:
Thank you for proofreading the galleys for your manuscript, "{$submissionTitle}," in {$contextName}. We are looking forward to publishing your work shortly.
If you subscribe to our notification service, you will receive an email of the Table of Contents as soon as it is published. If you have any questions, please contact me.
{$editorialContactSignature}
email_text.description: This email from the Series Editor to the Author acknowledges completion of the initial proofreading process and thanks them for their contribution.

email_text.subject: Proofreading Request
email_text.description: This email from the Series Editor to the Proofreader requests that they perform proofreading of a monograph's galleys. It provides information about the monograph and how to access it.

email_text.subject: Proofreading Completed
email_text.description: This email from the Proofreader to the Series Editor notifies them that the Proofreader has completed the proofreading process.

email_text.subject: Proofreading Acknowledgement
email_text.description: This email from the Series Editor to the Proofreader confirms completion of the proofreader's proofreading process and thanks them for their contribution.

email_text.subject: Proofreading Request (Layout Editor)
email_text.description: This email from the Series Editor to the Layout Editor notifies them that a monograph's galleys are ready for final proofreading. It provides information on the monograph and how to access it.

email_text.subject: Proofreading Completed (Layout Editor)
email_text.description: This email from the Layout Editor to the Series Editor notifies them that the final stage of proofreading has been completed and the monograph is now ready to publish.

email_text.subject: Proofreading Acknowledgement (Layout Editor)
email_text.description: This email from the Series Editor to the Layout Editor acknowledges completion of the final stage of proofreading and thanks them for their contribution.

email_text.subject: Manuscript of Possible Interest
email_text.body: Thought you might be interested in seeing "{$submissionTitle}" by {$authorName} published in Vol {$volume}, No {$number} ({$year}) of {$contextName} at "{$monographUrl}".
